    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_2781beafc2835d3b283508d018f839b9bd102381</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Observing the planet Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachten des Planeten Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observer la planète Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observando o planeta Marte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservazione del pianeta Marte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατήρηση του πλανήτη Αρης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observación del planeta Marte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates the different positions of the planet Mars to an observer on Earth as both planets travel along their respective orbits.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht die 
unterschiedlichen Positionen des Planeten Mars zu einem Beobachter auf
Masse, während beide Planeten entlang ihre jeweiligen Bahnen reisen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre les différentes positions de 
la planète Mars à un observateur sur terre pendant que les deux 
planètes voyagent le long de leurs orbites respectives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra as posições diferentes do 
planeta Marte a um observador na terra enquanto ambos os planetas 
viajam ao longo de suas órbitas respectivas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra le posizioni differenti del 
pianeta Marte ad un osservatore su terra mentre entrambi i pianeti 
viaggiano lungo le loro orbite rispettive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί τις διαφορετικές θέσεις του 
πλανήτη Αρης σε έναν παρατηρητή στη γη καθώς και οι δύο 
πλανήτες ταξιδεύουν κατά μήκος των αντίστοιχων τροχιών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra las diversas posiciones del 
planeta Marte a un observador respecto a la tierra mientras que ambos 
planetas viajan a lo largo de sus órbitas respectivas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
